snippet: The Copyright Royalty Board said the rate paid by Sirius XM Radio, the only satellite radio service in the United States, would increase each year from the current 8 percent of gross revenue to 11 percent in 2017.
abstract: The Copyright Royalty Board said the rate paid by Sirius XM Radio, the only satellite radio service in the United States, would increase each year from the current 8 percent of gross revenue to 11 percent in 2017.

headline.main: Royalties for Satellite Radio Set to Rise Steadily Through 2017
